title: Strunk and White
alt: The best thing about Strunk/White fanfiction is that it's virtually guaranteed to be well written.
transcript:
[Hairbun, with glasses, sits behind a desk typing on a computer. A line goes from the keyboard indicating that the text above is the one she types. Behind her stand Cueball with a book in his hand and a man with sideburns holding up a smoking pipe.]Dear Internet,
We, the current editors of 
Strunk & White's The Elements of
Style, must—with great reluctance—
clarify a point of orthography:"Strunk & White" should be 
used for the style manual and 
"Strunk/White" for the erotic 
fan fiction pairing.
